issue.title: Compilation error when ogre 1.9 and libcegui-mk2-0.7.6 are installed

content.raw:
Indeed, it was an incompatibility between ogre 1.9 and cegui probably lower than 0.8. Fixed at [this commit targeted to 0.8](https://bitbucket.org/cegui/cegui/pull-request/32/updated-ogre-forward-declaration/diff) branch.

We could:

 * Make something ugly to make it works. Check  42edb67 out.
 * Declare the incompatibility in our SearchForStuff for cegui and ogre 1.9
 * Release a patched cegui-0.7.6 deb package backporting the fix
content.html:
Indeed, it was an incompatibility between ogre 1.9 and cegui probably lower than 0.8. Fixed at this commit targeted to 0.8 branch.

We could:

  • Make something ugly to make it works. Check 42edb67 out.
  • Declare the incompatibility in our SearchForStuff for cegui and ogre 1.9
  • Release a patched cegui-0.7.6 deb package backporting the fix
